{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15763v1", "title": "Modulus of continuity of Monge--Ampère potentials in big cohomology
  classes", "summary": "In this paper, we prove a uniform estimate for the modulus of continuity of
solutions to degenerate complex Monge--Amp\`ere equation in big cohomology
classes. This improves the previous results of Di Nezza--Lu and of the first
author.", "main_category": "math.CV", "categories": "math.CV", "published": "2025-04-22T10:17:09Z"}
